name: MadMoneyLightningRound
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the Lightning Round from Mad Money with Jim Cramer with this Flash Briefing. Cramer takes viewer calls and is your guide through the confusing jungle of Wall Street investing.
Add Mad Money Lightning Round to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
After adding CNBC, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest.
Don't forget to check out all of CNBC's Flash Briefings on Alexa, including Mad Money Cramer Remix, CNBC Tech Check, CNBC Markets Now, and more. Just search for "CNBC" in the Alexa Skill Store.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
